availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jesse Price Sr. (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer & merchant)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Virginia native. Married to Lyncha Price. Father of George W. Price, Benjamin F. Price, Christopher C. Price, Sarah Price, and Kesiah F. Price. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850. Merchant with son in Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 102B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 149.
